subclusters.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
Autophagy Decline and Modulation Theory of Aging

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on finite replicative lifespan of cells, telomere shortening as a counting mechanism, and replicative senescence as a cellular aging model.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses replicative senescence, genetic regulation of senescence, and immortalization escape, emphasizing telomere and gene-based control of senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes epigenetic and telomere shortening as cellular clocks driving senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA damage, telomere erosion, and chromatin changes inducing permanent replicative arrest and senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes DNA damage accumulation and DNA damage response pathways as triggers of senescence and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes stress-induced premature senescence (SIPS) distinct from replicative senescence but mechanistically related via DNA damage and lysosomal dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Senescence and Telomere-Associated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links mitochondrial dysfunction and DNA damage response to cellular senescence and musculoskeletal aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p21 as a causal driver of senescence, cell cycle arrest, and SASP in muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes p53-mediated senescence and stem cell depletion as mechanisms driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links nuclear envelope defects to p53 hyperactivation causing senescence and accelerated aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses p53 tumor suppressor role in senescence and aging, balancing tumor suppression and aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p16INK4A-driven senescence in pancreatic β-cells affecting function and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes p16Ink4a-positive senescent cells accumulating with age and shortening healthy lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights role of p19ARF and p16INK4a tumor suppressors in senescence and aging-related pulmonary decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21/p16 and Tumor Suppressor-Mediated Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p53/p21 and p16Ink4a/pRB pathways mediating senescence in bone aging and osteoporosis.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes SASP secretion and NF-κB (RELA) activation driving chemoresistance and senescence-associated inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes chromatin architecture remodeling and enhancer dynamics regulating SASP expression in senescent cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on histone variant H2A.J accumulation promoting inflammatory SASP gene expression in senescent cells.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses SASP's dual role in aging and disease, emphasizing inflammatory secretome effects on tissue microenvironment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP secretion by senescent cells driving chronic inflammation and age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes SASP and senescent cell accumulation as drivers of aging and age-related pathologies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores dual roles of senescence and SASP in tissue repair and aging-related chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence, SASP, and therapeutic interventions (senolytics/senomorphics) to extend healthspan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes selective clearance of senescent cells marked by SA-β-gal reducing SASP-driven inflammation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on vascular smooth muscle cell senescence, SASP, and therapeutic targeting to ameliorate vascular aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes cell autonomous and non-autonomous effects of SASP in skin aging and tissue microenvironment.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links metabolic regulation of senescence and SASP to aging and chronic inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and NF-κB-Mediated Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: General overview of senescent cell accumulation, SASP, and therapeutic targeting to delay systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Endothelial Cell Senescence and Vascular Dysfunction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on endothelial cell senescence, SASP, and cerebrovascular dysfunction contributing to brain aging and disease.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline and Modulation Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes decline of macroautophagy with age and its stimulation by caloric restriction to delay aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline and Modulation Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on age-dependent autophagy suppression in neurons leading to accumulation of damaged proteins and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline and Modulation Theory of Aging
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows genetic enhancement of autophagy improves aging phenotypes and extends lifespan in mice.
